com.cjsavage.java.net.discovery

Interface ServiceAnnouncer.Listener

  • Enclosing class:
    ServiceAnnouncer

    public static interface ServiceAnnouncer.Listener
    Interface for responding to ServerAnnouncer events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void listenStateChanged(ServiceAnnouncer announcer, boolean listening)
      Called when the listening state of a ServiceAnnouncer has changed.
      void receiveRequest(ClientRequest request, InetAddress source, ServiceAnnouncer announcer)
      Called when a ServerAnnouncer has received a request from a client.

    • Method Detail

      • listenStateChanged

        void listenStateChanged(ServiceAnnouncer announcer,
                      boolean listening)
        Called when the listening state of a ServiceAnnouncer has changed.
        Parameters:
        announcer - the ServiceAnnouncer who's state has changed
        listening - true if the ServiceAnnouncer is listening for requests

      • receiveRequest

        void receiveRequest(ClientRequest request,
                  InetAddress source,
                  ServiceAnnouncer announcer)
        Called when a ServerAnnouncer has received a request from a client.
        Parameters:
        request - the ClientRequest that was received
        source - the InetAddress that sent the request
        announcer - the ServiceAnnouncer that received the request
